Race.SpecificTitle: Election District 5B -- Prop. #1 - Package Alcohol >6% - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO SELL BEVERAGES OF ALCOHOLIC CONTENT CONTAINING NOT MORE THAN SIX PERCENT ALCOHOL BY VOLUME BY PACKAGE ONLY AND NOT FOR CONSUMPTION ON THE PREMISES IN ELECTION DISTRICT 5B OF THE PARISH OF CONCORDIA.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent (6%) alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in Election District 5B of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Election District 5B -- Prop. #2 - Alcohol Sales >6% - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO SELL BEVERAGES OF ALCOHOLIC CONTENT CONTAINING NOT MORE THAN SIX PERCENT ALCOHOL BY VOLUME FOR CONSUMPTION ON THE PREMISES IN ELECTION DISTRICT 5B OF THE PARISH OF CONCORDIA.
Race.FullText: Shall the sales of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent (6%) alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in Election District 5B of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Election District 5B -- Prop. #3 - Alcohol Sales <1/2% - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO SELL BEVERAGES OF ALCOHOLIC CONTENT CONTAINING ONE-HALF OF ONE PERCENT ALCOHOL BY VOLUME AND ABOVE FOR CONSUMPTION ON THE PREMISES IN ELECTION DISTRICT 5B OF THE PARISH OF CONCORDIA.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent (1/2%) alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in Election District 5B of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Election Division 5B -- Prop. #4 - Package Alcohol <1/2% - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 4

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO SELL BEVERAGES OF ALCOHOLIC CONTENT CONTAINING ONE-HALF OF ONE PERCENT ALCOHOL BY VOLUME AND ABOVE BY PACKAGE ONLY AND NOT FOR CONSUMPTION ON THE PREMISES IN ELECTION DISTRICT 5B OF THE PARISH OF CONCORDIA.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent (1/2%) alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in Election District 5B of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Election Division 5B -- Prop. #5 - Restaurant Alcohol Sales - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 5

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY TO SELL BEVERAGES OF HIGH AND LOW ALCOHOLIC CONTENT PERMITTED ONLY ON THE PREMISES OF RESTAURANT ESTABLISHMENTS WHICH HAVE BEEN ISSUED AN "R" PERMIT, AS DEFINED BY LAW, IN ELECTION DISTRICT 5B OF THE PARISH OF CONCORDIA.
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit, as defined by law, in Election District 5B of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana?
